q: Sometimes out of your biggest misery, comes your greatest gain.
h:
“Sometimes out of your biggest misery, comes your greatest gain.” —
Steve Harvey

q: Your heart is full of fertile seeds, waiting to sprout.
h:
“Your heart is full of fertile seeds, waiting to sprout.” —
Morihei Ueshiba

q: You cannot control the behavior of others, but you can always choose how you respond to it.
h:
“You cannot control the behavior of others, but you can always choose how you respond to it.” —
Roy T. Bennett

q: Even if you stumble and fall down, it doesn't mean you've chosen the wrong path.
h:
“Even if you stumble and fall down, it doesn't mean you've chosen the wrong path.” —
Zen Proverb

q: Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without one.
h:
“Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without one.” —
Chinese Proverb

q: Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.
h:
“Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree. ” —
Martin Luther

q: You are free, and that is why you are lost.
h:
“You are free, and that is why you are lost. ” —
Franz Kafka

q: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
h:
“Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.” —
Helen Keller

q: Anyone who dreams of an uncommon life eventually discovers there is no choice but to seek an uncommon approach to living it.
h:
“Anyone who dreams of an uncommon life eventually discovers there is no choice but to seek an uncommon approach to living it.” —
Gary Keller

q: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
h:
“Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage. ” —
Lao Tzu

q: There's no next time. It's now or never.
h:
“There's no next time. It's now or never.” —
Celestine Chua

q: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
h:
“Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.” —
Jim Rohn

q: Never feel shame for trying and failing, for he who has never failed is he who has never tried.
h:
“Never feel shame for trying and failing, for he who has never failed is he who has never tried.” —
Og Mandino

q: The greater the impact you want to make, the greater your influence needs to be.
h:
“The greater the impact you want to make, the greater your influence needs to be.” —
Lolly Daskal

q: People with clear, written goals, accomplish far more in a shorter period of time than people without them could ever imagine.
h:
“People with clear, written goals, accomplish far more in a shorter period of time than people without them could ever imagine.” —
Brian Tracy

q: I am thankful to all who said no to me. It is because of them that I'm doing it myself.
h:
“I am thankful to all who said no to me. It is because of them that I'm doing it myself.” —
Albert Einstein

q: The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.
h:
“The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.” —
Coco Chanel

q: We cannot change anything unless we accept it.
h:
“We cannot change anything unless we accept it.” —
Carl Jung

q: One machine can do the work of fifty ordinary men. No machine can do the work of one extraordinary man.
h:
“One machine can do the work of fifty ordinary men. No machine can do the work of one extraordinary man.” —
Elbert Hubbard

q: If you're waiting until you feel talented enough to make it, you'll never make it.
h:
“If you're waiting until you feel talented enough to make it, you'll never make it.” —
Criss Jami

q: Yesterday is the past, tomorrow is the future, today is a gift - that's why it's called the present.
h:
“Yesterday is the past, tomorrow is the future, today is a gift - that's why it's called the present.” —
George Bernard Shaw

q: Success is not what you do when you are on top.  Success is how high you bounce when you hit the bottom.
h:
“Success is not what you do when you are on top. Success is how high you bounce when you hit the bottom.” —
Sonia Ricotti

q: Everyone has the right to make his own decisions, but none has the right to force his decision on others.
h:
“Everyone has the right to make his own decisions, but none has the right to force his decision on others.” —
Ayn Rand

q: The more something scares you, the more you should do it.
h:
“The more something scares you, the more you should do it.” —
Mark Manson

q: One never does wrong by doing right.
h:
“One never does wrong by doing right.” —
Norman Vincent Peale

q: The way to change others' minds is with affection, and not anger.
h:
“The way to change others' minds is with affection, and not anger.” —
Dalai Lama

q: From error to error one discovers the entire truth.
h:
“From error to error one discovers the entire truth.” —
Sigmund Freud

q: I must also have a dark side if I am to be whole.
h:
“I must also have a dark side if I am to be whole.” —
Carl Jung

q: You make your own luck if you stay at it long enough.
h:
“You make your own luck if you stay at it long enough.” —
Naval Ravikant

q: I cannot make my days longer so I strive to make them better.
h:
“I cannot make my days longer so I strive to make them better.” —
Henry David Thoreau

q: TEAMWORK: the fuel that allows common people attain uncommon results.
h:
“TEAMWORK: the fuel that allows common people attain uncommon results.” —
Andrew Carnegie

q: The most creative act you will ever undertake is the act of creating yourself.
h:
“The most creative act you will ever undertake is the act of creating yourself.” —
Deepak Chopra

q: Words are clothes that thoughts wear
h:
“Words are clothes that thoughts wear” —
Samuel Butler

q: Be curious, not judgmental.
h:
“Be curious, not judgmental.” —
Walt Whitman

q: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
h:
“A loving heart is the truest wisdom.” —
Charles Dickens

q: Growth is in a series of mistakes. That's the only way you learn.
h:
“Growth is in a series of mistakes. That's the only way you learn.” —
Steve Harvey

q: No man becomes rich unless he enriches others.
h:
“No man becomes rich unless he enriches others.” —
Andrew Carnegie

q: Paths are made by walking.
h:
“Paths are made by walking.” —
Franz Kafka

q: There are two primary choices in life: to accept conditions as they exist, or accept the responsibility for changing them.
h:
“There are two primary choices in life: to accept conditions as they exist, or accept the responsibility for changing them.” —
Denis Waitley

q: Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul.
h:
“Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul.” —
Henry Ward Beecher

q: A single dream is more powerful than a thousand realities.
h:
“A single dream is more powerful than a thousand realities.” —
J.R.R. Tolkien

q: Nothing can survive without food. Everything we consume acts either to heal us or to poison us.
h:
“Nothing can survive without food. Everything we consume acts either to heal us or to poison us.” —
Thich Nhat Hanh

q: When you stop questioning, you stop learning.
h:
“When you stop questioning, you stop learning.” —
Lolly Daskal

q: It is those who concentrate on but one thing at a time who advance in this world.
h:
“It is those who concentrate on but one thing at a time who advance in this world.” —
Gary Keller

q: You have to make time, even for something as universal as staring at the stars.
h:
“You have to make time, even for something as universal as staring at the stars.” —
W.P. Kinsella

q: If it entertains you now but will bore you someday, it's a distraction. Keep looking.
h:
“If it entertains you now but will bore you someday, it's a distraction. Keep looking.” —
Naval Ravikant

q: Failure is not fatal, but failure to change might be.
h:
“Failure is not fatal, but failure to change might be.” —
John Wooden

q: If we are not able to smile, then the world will not have peace.
h:
“If we are not able to smile, then the world will not have peace.” —
Thich Nhat Hanh

q: Never take your position for granted and never let any favors you receive go to your head.
h:
“Never take your position for granted and never let any favors you receive go to your head.” —
Robert Greene

q: If the happiness and prosperity of other people depend on you, you have nothing to fear anymore.
h:
“If the happiness and prosperity of other people depend on you, you have nothing to fear anymore.” —
Robert Greene
